  • Constructor Details

    • Miner

      public Miner(MinerNetwork minerNetwork, TransactionNetwork transactionNetwork, PublicKey publicKey, BlockChain blockChain, UTXOPool utxoPool)
      A miner is a node that is actively miner for new blocks as well as verifying transactions
      Parameters:
      minerNetwork - the network the miner is apart of
      transactionNetwork - the transaction network that miners are apart of
      publicKey - the public key associated with this miner
      blockChain - a copy of the block chain
      utxoPool - a reference to the utxo pool set

    • updateMiner

      public void updateMiner(String challenge, String nonce)
      Method to update other miners when a puzzle has been solved and a block is being proposed for consensus
      Specified by:
      updateMiner in interface IMinerObserver
      Parameters:
      challenge - the challenge that was solved
      nonce - the nonce that solves the challenge

    • isBlockValid

      public boolean isBlockValid(Block block, String challenge, String nonce)
      Method to check to see if a block is valid
      Parameters:
      block - the block that needs to be checked
      challenge - the challenge that was solved
      nonce - the nonce that solves the challenge
      Returns:
      True if the block is successfully solved

    • isHashValid

      private boolean isHashValid(byte[] prevBlockHash, Block block)
      Method to check if the hash of a block is a valid hash
      Parameters:
      prevBlockHash - the prevBlockHash is the hash of the block BEFORE this block in the chain
      block - the current block
      Returns:
      IF the prevBlockHash is equal to the block's prev Hash, then it is valid and the chain can continue so return true, if not, then this represents a break in the chain, so return false and don't add this block
